summary: The module provides unit tests for the MONAI Auto3Dseg ensemble utilities, including a helper that synthesizes 3D image data and a test suite that verifies the ensemble builder, configuration parsing, bestâ€‘model selection strategies, and the ensemble runner execution under various conditions.
business_intent: Validate and ensure the robustness of automated ensemble creation and model selection workflows in medical imaging segmentation pipelines, supporting reliable deployment of the best performing models.
